Jukeberry 1.0.0

Operations

    Untagged
    Pub Inform when a card has been read Pub Inform when the stop button was pushed

Jukeberry 1.0.0

Apache 2.0

Jukeberry lets you select music from a group of RFID cards and play it on any device listening the proper events

Servers

tcp://mr1nljqp0y1g2d.messaging.solace.cloud:21128 mqtt

Operations

Pub card/presented

Inform when a card has been read

Accepts the following message:

Payload
object
id
integer
>= 0

Id of read card.

text
string

The card might have any text description.

sentAt
string
date-time

Date and time when the message was sent.

Additional properties are allowed.

Examples

{
  "id": 0,
  "text": "string",
  "sentAt": "2020-04-25T12:57:46Z"
}
This example has been generated automatically.

Pub stop/pushed

Inform when the stop button was pushed

Accepts the following message:

Payload
object
sentAt
string
date-time

Date and time when the message was sent

Additional properties are allowed.

Examples

{
  "sentAt": "2020-04-25T12:57:46Z"
}
This example has been generated automatically.
